channel.title: Bugs/Issues I've found so far
channel.description:
First of all thanks for making this great mod! It's really good and for a 1.0 release it's good working. So here're the bugs and issues I've seen after one playthrough and a half re-play:
[i]Map bm_c1a0a[/i]
Sometimes at the end of the map, the map changer doesn't trigger, resulting in you getting stuck in front of the door
[url]https://i.imgur.com/Oxzlk.jpg[/url] [url]https://i.imgur.com/ZBgBn.jpg[/url] (setpos -1428.000000 1816.000000 -135.968750;setang 14.035992 14.994673 0.000000)
[i]Map bm_c1a2b[/i]
[url]https://i.imgur.com/LDYZF.jpg[/url] (setpos -1281.611572 822.748840 352.031250;setang -2.807192 62.962902 0.000000)
The limb of one of the scientists can become crazy resulting in strange ragdoll sounds and neverending fountains of blood.
[i]Map bm_c1a4b[/i]
setpos -98.037804 -2322.498535 1600.031250;setang 5.486801 90.701797 0.000000 <- the trigger at this location right after the elevator plays music even tho' the music volume is set to 0% in the game options.
[i]Map bm_c1a1e[/i]
The gap in the door at the crate jumping section looks like you could jump through, resulting in me (the player) thinking there might be something in the room trying it 4 times but died every time (gap should be smaller).
[url]https://i.imgur.com/ZKN0k.jpg[/url] (setpos -3959.948730 -6984.881348 -3489.960938;setang 13.270383 78.472160 0.000000)
[i]Map bm_c2a2c[/i]
[url]https://i.imgur.com/PcTpy.jpg[/url] (setpos -65.671539 -830.257507 249.123489;setang 9.761415 46.933495 0.000000)
After you launch the rocket into space, the smoke doesn't go all the way to the ground.
[i]Map bm_c2a5a[/i]
Some surfaces on the dam are not rendered (can't swim or shoot through; left in nodraw textures?).
[url]https://i.imgur.com/UKCfp.jpg[/url] (setpos -3515.517334 1085.030151 466.459442;setang 15.248157 -41.639633 0.000000) [url]https://i.imgur.com/5AK3H.jpg[/url] (setpos -3176.592529 1898.933472 687.283997;setang -2.998649 -5.401257 0.000000)
Displacement bug
[url]https://i.imgur.com/yHNmh.jpg[/url] (setpos -3866.026123 -591.527954 212.465149;setang 18.884754 -74.943253 0.000000)
[b]OTHER[/b]
- Fighting against the helicopters at the dam and/or the cliff with your flashlight on can result in the game crashing.

item.title: Bugs/Issues I've found so far
item.dc:creator: Delfer54
item.description:
First of all thanks for making this great mod! It’s really good and for a 1.0 release it’s good working. So here’re the bugs and issues I’ve seen after one playthrough and a half re-play:

Map bm_c1a0a

Sometimes at the end of the map, the map changer doesn’t trigger, resulting in you getting stuck in front of the door

https://i.imgur.com/Oxzlk.jpg
https://i.imgur.com/ZBgBn.jpg
(setpos -1428.000000 1816.000000 -135.968750;setang 14.035992 14.994673 0.000000)

Map bm_c1a2b

https://i.imgur.com/LDYZF.jpg
(setpos -1281.611572 822.748840 352.031250;setang -2.807192 62.962902 0.000000)

The limb of one of the scientists can become crazy resulting in strange ragdoll sounds and neverending fountains of blood.

Map bm_c1a4b

setpos -98.037804 -2322.498535 1600.031250;setang 5.486801 90.701797 0.000000 <- the trigger at this location right after the elevator plays music even tho’ the music volume is set to 0% in the game options.

Map bm_c1a1e

The gap in the door at the crate jumping section looks like you could jump through, resulting in me (the player) thinking there might be something in the room trying it 4 times but died every time (gap should be smaller).

https://i.imgur.com/ZKN0k.jpg
(setpos -3959.948730 -6984.881348 -3489.960938;setang 13.270383 78.472160 0.000000)

Map bm_c2a2c

https://i.imgur.com/PcTpy.jpg
(setpos -65.671539 -830.257507 249.123489;setang 9.761415 46.933495 0.000000)

After you launch the rocket into space, the smoke doesn’t go all the way to the ground.

Map bm_c2a5a

Some surfaces on the dam are not rendered (can’t swim or shoot through; left in nodraw textures?).

https://i.imgur.com/UKCfp.jpg
(setpos -3515.517334 1085.030151 466.459442;setang 15.248157 -41.639633 0.000000)
https://i.imgur.com/5AK3H.jpg
(setpos -3176.592529 1898.933472 687.283997;setang -2.998649 -5.401257 0.000000)

Displacement bug

https://i.imgur.com/yHNmh.jpg
(setpos -3866.026123 -591.527954 212.465149;setang 18.884754 -74.943253 0.000000)

OTHER

  • Fighting against the helicopters at the dam and/or the cliff with your flashlight on can result in the game crashing.

Read full topic
